And she writes different
hints and tips on it

2027.21.text:
at different times of the
year when it's applicable.

2029.38.text:
So when it's exam time, she's
going to write to exam tips

2032.45.text:
Maybe when she's starting off,
she'll write some of the tips

2036.58.text:
And I'm gonna put
Jessica's tip -

2038.89.text: I'm going to put it on our wall.

2044.41.text:
KAREN FOLEY: Thank
you, Jessica, for that.

2045.82.text:
And thank you everybody
else for your tips,

2046.83.text:
I've heard there's a problem
with our printer at the moment.

2048.62.text:
So we can't get
anything up on the desk.

2050.29.text:
But thank you so much
for sending all those in.

2052.25.text: And we do love to do that.

2053.36.text:
And we'll certainly have them
up and ready for next week,

2056.97.text:
But don't put your details
on the Twitter feed.

2059.51.text:
Do e-mail them to us or instant
message us with them instead.
